HUGE UPSETS IN WISCONSIN.

COULD SPELL DELEGATE TROUBLE FOR

THE FIRST PREVIEW FOR "STAR

AND THERE'S NO OTHER WAY TO SAY
IT.
IT IS "STAR WARS"!

AND I MEAN THAT IN THE MOST WAY

STORMTROOPERS, IMPERIAL WALKERS,
THAT DROID THAT'S JUST A BOX

COURSE THE DEATH STAR WHICH THE

FOR SOME REASON.

NOW THE MOVIE COMES OUT IN

MY ONLY ISSUE IS SHOULDN'T I

I'M USED TO WAITING TEN YEARS
FOR A NEW "STAR WARS" MOVIE, 20
FOR A GOOD ONE.

NOW DON'T GET ME WRONG, I'M
GOING TO BE THERE SEE IT OPENING

WEEKEND JUST LIKE I WILL FOR
EPISODE 8, THE YOUNG HANS SALO

MOVIE,EP SIDE NINE, THE BOBA
FETT AND THE VH-1 BEHIND THE

ONE IN THE NEW TITLE, THAT WAY

WE KNOW THERE WILL BE SEQUELS
AND I CAN'T WAIT FOR THE SIXTH,
ROGUE ONE TWO EPISODE THREE.

ANYWAY, WHAT WAS I TALKING
ABOUT.

OH YEAH, LEADER OF THE FREE
WORLD, THE 2016 ELECTION IS
FINALLY STARTING TO TAKE SHAPE.

UNFORTUNATELY, THAT SHAPE IS
KIND OF LUMPY.

THIS IS THE ROAD TO THE WHITE
HOUSE.

>> KNOCK THE CRAP OUT OF HIM,
WOULD YOU?

WHICH HAS GIVEN HIM PLENTY OF

TAKE THE BLEEP TRAIN TED.

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
NOW FOR YOU NONNEW YORKERS, THE

F [BLEEP] TRAIN SAY PROMINENT
LINE HERE IN THE CITY.

WE FREAKILY TELL OUT OF TOWNERS
TO TAKE IT.

BUT EVEN IF NEW YORKERS AREN'T

STILL RACKING UP ENDORSEMENTS
RIGHT AND FURTHER RIGHT.

DIRECTOR JIM RISCH WAS ASKED WHO

WHO ARE YOU ENDORSING NOW?

>> ARE YOU NOT GOING TO SUPPORT

SO BY PROCESS OF ELIMINATION,

>> AT THIS POINT THERE'S NO

YES, AT THIS POINT THERE'S NO

LINDSEY GRAHAM AND MIKE LEE YOUR

>> I DO.

ENDORSEMENT PLEENS THROWING UP

RIGHT?

THAT ENDORSEMENT IS GOING TO

SO TED CRUZ IS PILING UP

TRUMP.

WE MIGHT BE ON OUR WAY TO WHAT
IS CALLED A CONTESTED
CONVENTION.

THAT'S WHEN NO CANDIDATE HOLDS A

DELEGATES SO THE NOMINEE IS
CHOSEN THROUGH WHEELING AND

DEALING, OR ON RARE OCCASIONS, A

HOW DO YOU THINK NIXON GOT THE

BUT OH, DADDY LIKE.

HERE, HERE'S WHERE IT GETS
SUPERCRAZY THE GOP COULD

YEAR NOW SOME NAMES, SOME
NAMES-- GOOD MEN, SOME NAMES

HAVE ALREADY BEEN FLOATED LIKE

ROMNEY.

I KNOW I JUST SAID HIM, BUT
PEOPLE FORGET HIM SO QUICKLY.

NOW IN AN ACT OF DES OPERATION,
WHO KNOWS WHO THE GOP WILL

COULD BE SCROOGE McDUCK, A
OUIJA BOARD THAT SPELLS OUT

LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, JOIN ME

YES, OH YES.
IT'S NOT OVER YET, NO.
YES.
WA.

ALL RIGHT.
ORDINARY PACK OF CARDS.

AND WHAT'S THAT.
